topics.body:
So, this was something I came up with last week for breakfast due to ingredient shortage.

!https://fbcdn-sphotos-g-a.akamaihd.net/hphotos-ak-xaf1/v/t1.0-9/s720x720/10500391_956200631087324_5853237161713649975_n.jpg?oh=39b97569a3372f1ed79aa8cd76060200&oe=5595BD70&__gda__=1434108311_3761cc3cfd4b761cf8d2c309680814dc!
